## ðŸ”¨ Development

1. Clone this repository

   ```sh
   git clone https://github.com/5ouma/appearance-mode.git
   ```

2. Install [Deno](https://deno.com)

3. Run the [`server.tsx`](../src/server.tsx) via these task runners

   ```sh
   # For production
   deno task start
   ```

   ```sh
   # For development
   deno task dev
   ```
